blocks.innerHtml: This skeletal animation was created in OpenGL 2 using C++ for one of my University courses, COSC 422 (Advanced Computer Graphics), during Semester 2 of 2022. The project itself received an A+ (95%) grade for the course.

The scene depicts a robot character walking around a football field. Using the arrow keys, the character can be rotated around while in motion. A BVH mocap file was used for the skeletal animation, and was loaded and animated using Assimp. The skeletal animation makes use of planar shadows, a hand model with fingers, joint rotations without visible gaps between the mesh surfaces, and various shapes, models, and textures.
